clothing_choices: %firstname% wears a cropped jacket with decorative {alloy|foammetal|reinforced aerogel|carbon fiber|interlocking} plates over a {skintight bodysuit|form-fitting bodysuit|relaxed jumpsuit|reinforced jumpsuit|breathable speedsuit}, a stylized interpretation of a Lancer's combat suit

%firstname% wears a {relaxed|thin|cropped} {graphic|plain|corporate|branded|printed} {t-shirt|v-neck|tank top|polo|jersey}{ under a %color% %textile% jacket|}, {straight|cargo|short|long|strapped|reinforced|baggy|loose} {pants|trousers}, and {chunky|extremely fashionable|bright %color%} {sneakers|shoes|boots}
%firstname% wears {an enticingly|an alluringly|a provocatively} open {%textile%|puffy|flowing} {jacket|coat|overcoat|longcoat|sport coat} over {bare skin|tight undergarments|sheer undergarments}
%firstname% wears a comfortable %textile% sweatshirt and simple, {relaxed|loose-fitting} {pants|trousers|shorts|overalls}

%firstname% wears a {tight|skintight|sheer} undersuit, layered with %textile% {panels|shards|patches|sheets|leaves|feathers|fronds|membranes|blankets|lamina} and wide, {puffy|wrinkled|flowing} sleeves

%firstname% wears a {high-necked|low-cut} %color% {dress|suit}, {precisely|stylishly} cut for {bare arms|bare shoulders|a bare midriff}, with {tight|loose|wide|flowing|short} {trousers|slacks|trews}. The outfit is {crisscrossed by|overlaid with|encircled by|layered with} light-emitting bands, {gently glowing|gently pulsing|that pulse languidly|colored to match %firstname%'s eyes|colored to match %firstname%'s hair|colored to reflect %firstname%'s mood}

%firstname% wears a floating array of {wide|angular|jagged|ovoid|undulating|shuddering|free-floating} %color% %textile% {panels|shards|patches|sheets|leaves|feathers|fronds|membranes|blankets|lamina}, buoyed by tiny diamond-encased envelopes of vacuum, the pinnacle of {high|experimental|Cosmopolitan|Spaceborn} fashion

%firstname% wears a {puffy|silken|military-style} %color% {blouson|bolero|bomber jacket} with a {synthetic fur fringe|wide, concealing hood|seal for a detachable helmet|cargo netting wrap|webbing of straps and carabiners}, over {nothing at all|hydrophobic swimwear|polytextile sportswear|silken yáº¿m|a full-body hardsuit interface|a tight shirt|a loose shirt|a sheer top|cropped undergarments|skintight bodysuit}

%firstname% wears the latest Smith-Shimano contemporary fashion lines: {bright colors|muted colors|shades of black|brilliant hues|shimmering metallics|gleaming synthetic diamondfiber|chromatic metaplastics|ultralight nanotextiles|pulsating organotextiles|undulating organofiber|neurolinked kinetextile}, {enticing cuts|alluring cuts|draped scarves|elegant lines|angular silhouettes|modest lines|sophisticated cuts|classic lines|throwback trim}, and {mountains of jewelry|a dusting of jewelry|the latest personal microdrone|the latest SSC dataslate|a kitschy throwback GMS dataslate}

%firstname% wears a {skintight|full} bodysuit of {temperature-regulating|figure-enhancing|jet black|slate grey|opalescent} {metatextile|polyfabric|smartfabric|nanofiber|reticulated demifiber}, studded with miniature holoprojectors that project {the translucent illusion of a stylized mech|sheets of flowing, tessellating patterns that cascade like water|falling water|falling snow|gently drifting cherry blossoms|wisps of wine-dark nebulae|falling stars|mist, pooling quietly around %pro_pos% feet|tongues of flame|a cartoonish "x-ray" of %pro_pos% body as %pro_sub% moves|cascading sheets of light|a constellation of stars}
